pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Analysis of a Circular GLM // Perform a Bayesian analysis of a circular outcome General Linear Model (GLM), which allows regressing a circular outcome on linear and categorical predictors. Posterior samples are obtained by means of an MCMC algorithm written in 'C++' through 'Rcpp'. Estimation and credible intervals are provided, as well as hypothesis testing through Bayes Factors. See Mulder and Klugkist (2017) doi:10.1016/j.jmp.2017.07.001.
